== Thovinakere (611004) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Thovinakere is a village in the [[Koratagere ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 273.5 hectares and harbouring 829 households with total population of 3394 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Koratagere]] is at a distance of 20 km. Male population is 1717 and female population is 1677. Scheduled Caste Population is 478 and Scheduled Tribes population is 177. Census Location Code of the village is 611004<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 2452 (72.25%)
* Literate male population: 1358 (79.09%)
* Literate female population: 1094 (65.24%)
